data.text: Have been travelling to Pefkos for quite a few years but always stayed at different accommodation so this was the first time at the Matina and it did not disappoint. Perfect location, short walk from the beach and pubs and restaurants, with a lovely restaurant on site Meltemi and Peoples Bar/Matina Bar and two fab pools with plenty of sun beds. Staff were always friendly around the complex and on the first morning when our toaster did not work a quick call and we received a new one. We felt so relaxed during our 11 nights that we’ve booked again for next year. The apartments some would say need a bit of an update but to be honest we found them fine with everything we needed in the kitchen area and having a table and chairs was good.  The bathroom was fine, the only thing I’d say is the shower is stuck on the wall at an odd angle to use properly and the shower curtains need replacing with maybe a screen but apart from that we had no issues.  The beds were comfy and there was enough clothes space. I would recommend this complex, its basic compared to the odd few but is adequate enough for what you need.
data.title: Perfect Location in Pefkos

data.text:
Fourth visits to Matina, but we haven’t been in 7 years.
Last week of the season and although the resort was very quiet (a ghost town), the Marina apartments kept going until November 5th.
The upgrades to the room amenities are good - we were in a 1 bed - and well appreciated.
A few more glasses, iron and board in the rooms wouldn’t go a miss for the new season.
The staff are superb, even in their final week of a long season they are still smiling. 
The meltimi restaurant is excellent and good value.
Would highly recommend
data.title: As good a holiday as you can have

Comfortable and spacious one bedroom apartment. Well worth the upgrade for 3 people.

Super friendly staff. High standards of cleanliness and great options for food and drinks.

Location is superb. 

We mainly ate out due to the wide range on the doorstep however we had 3 lovely breakfasts and a couple of lunches.

If you were to ask me for anything negative I would say their tsatziki is a bit bland.

Will be back in a flash.
data.title: Fab holiday. Great accommodation.

data.text:
Just finished a fantastic week at the Marina Pefkos, there were 7 of us in 3 separate rooms.

All rooms were basic, but perfectly fine, beds comfortable and a small kitchen area to cook a bit of breakfast etc.

Bathrooms were a little dated and are probably due a refresh.

2 pools - both on the chilly side but it is October. Spotlessly clean. 

Hotel is perfectly located for access to the beach and the bars / restaurants.

Big shout out to the staff - everyone very friendly and give the whole place a welcoming family feel.

We were blessed with 7 days of sunshine - would definitely return 
.
data.title: Excellent family hotel
